osvSchema.summary: jruby-openssl Gem for JRuby fails to do proper certificate validation
osvSchema.details:
A security problem involving peer certificate verification was found where
failed verification silently did nothing, making affected applications
vulnerable to attackers. Attackers could lead a client application to believe
that a secure connection to a rogue SSL server is legitimate. Attackers could
also penetrate client-validated SSL server applications with a dummy
certificate.

description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

Attackers could lead a client application to believe that a secure connection to a rogue SSL server is legitimate. Attackers could also penetrate client-validated SSL server applications with a dummy certificate.
advisories.title: Fails to do proper certificate validation
